name: The Muse
headline: The Muse is values-based job search & hiring for 7M+ monthly
description: The Muse is a values-based careers site that helps Gen Z and millennial candidates find a career path and search for jobs at companies whose people, benefits, and values align with their unique professional needs. For employers, our marketplace results in a more efficient hiring process that results in better "matches" - and therefore better retention.

founders.name: Alex Cavoulacos
founders.description:
Founder at Meta Angels and Angel Labs.
Previous: Founder at The Muse (W12). Author "The New Rules of Work", Parisian living in NYC

# Find work that's worth it.
Make a career match where the people, perks and values align with your needs.
![](https://advice-assets.themuse.com/advice-static/images/homepage-hero-image.jpg)
[](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/maya>)
Find AI-powered career advice with Maya from The Muse. Ask Maya anything you need to get ahead in your career—from “What can I do with an English degree?” to “How can I get better at networking?”
[Get started](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/maya>)
![](https://cms-assets.themuse.com/media/lead/maya-circle.jpg)
## Explore Companies
We think company culture is pretty important. We show you inside offices before you apply to make sure you'll love working there.
### Top Companies Hiring Now
![](https://pilbox.themuse.com/image.jpg?filter=antialias&opt=1&pos=top-left&prog=1&q=keep&url=https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/15000596/about_modules/None/profile_image_1.jpg&w=327)![](https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/15000596/small_logo.png)
### TruGreen
For over 50 years, our associates have worked persistently to provide top-tier lawn care and excellent service to their customers, with each lawn bringing greater opportunity. We are committed to supporting our associates by providing competitive salaries, comprehensive benefits, opportunities for career growth, and the stability that only a company with over four decades of proven success and experience can provide. Joining the TruGreen team means making a commitment to customers, to family, and to home. And if you join our team, we make a commitment to you, too.
[view jobs](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/search/company/trugreen>)[view profile](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/profiles/trugreen>)
![](https://pilbox.themuse.com/image.jpg?filter=antialias&opt=1&pos=top-left&prog=1&q=keep&url=https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/15000158/about_modules/115014/2eca64bf-54bb-4a62-b66f-043e9a91ed3d.jpg&w=327)![](https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/15000158/small_logo.png)
### CCC Intelligent Solutions
At CCC, we’re all about connecting - from our people to our products. Our teams work together to innovate next generation solutions that advance the industry’s digital transformation. We offer the flexibility to work remotely or at our state-of-the-art Chicago headquarters, where amenities include a full-size basketball court, health club, outside rooftop terrace, as well as pool tables, shuffleboard, and other activities to unwind. Our teams collaborate in our NXT Lab innovation hub where regular hackathons push boundaries of what’s next. Our many Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion initiatives and our CCC Gives Back community giving program keep us connected to what matters most.
[view jobs](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/search/company/cccintelligentsolutions>)[view profile](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/profiles/cccintelligentsolutions>)
![](https://pilbox.themuse.com/image.jpg?filter=antialias&opt=1&pos=top-left&prog=1&q=keep&url=https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/15000241/about_modules/117570/b1fbf493-2de5-4008-8910-6b4eb64321d1.jpg&w=327)![](https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/15000241/small_logo.png)
### Computershare
Since Computershare was established in Melbourne in 1978, our operations have expanded across five continents. We gain unique insights from around the world and integrate best practice and innovation to strengthen our competitive advantage and deliver market-leading solutions. We offer more than jobs — we offer real careers and long-term professional development. We invest in our employees so they can achieve their professional goals. We encourage our people to dive in, roll up their sleeves and take on the many opportunities bound to come their way. Learn more about life at Computershare.
[view jobs](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/search/company/computershare>)[view profile](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/profiles/computershare>)
![](https://pilbox.themuse.com/image.jpg?filter=antialias&opt=1&pos=top-left&prog=1&q=keep&url=https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/12360/about_modules/103045/07897903-e43a-411f-a76a-29217e6687d1.jpg&w=327)![](https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/12360/small_logo.png)
### RTX
RTX With more than 185,000 global employees, RTX pushes the limits of technology and science to redefine how we connect and protect our world. Through industry-leading businesses – Collins Aerospace, Pratt & Whitney, and Raytheon – we are advancing aviation, engineering integrated defense systems, and developing next-generation technology solutions and manufacturing to help global customers address their most critical challenges. The company, with 2023 sales of $69 billion, is headquartered in Arlington, Virginia. Collins Aerospace Collins Aerospace, an RTX business, is a leader in technologically advanced and intelligent solutions for the global aerospace and defense industry. Collins Aerospace has the extensive capabilities, comprehensive portfolio and broad expertise to solve customers’ toughest challenges and to meet the demands of a rapidly evolving global market. Pratt & Whitney Pratt & Whitney, an RTX business, is a world leader in the design, manufacture and service of aircraft and helicopter engines and auxiliary power units. Raytheon Raytheon, an RTX business, creates next-generation defense solutions that are smarter, faster and better than previously thought possible. Raytheon specializes in integrated air and missile defense, advanced sensors, space-based systems, hypersonics, effectors and cyber solutions.
[view jobs](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/search/company/rtx>)[view profile](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/profiles/rtx>)
![](https://pilbox.themuse.com/image.jpg?filter=antialias&opt=1&pos=top-left&prog=1&q=keep&url=https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/15000262/about_modules/None/profile_image_1.jpg&w=327)![](https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/15000262/small_logo.png)
### Delta Dental Ins.
Headquartered in San Francisco, we are members of the Delta Dental Plans Association, a network of companies that provides dental coverage to 80 million people. Through our Foundation, we provide support to organizations in our communities that increase access to care and we provide funding for oral health education, scholarships and research. Since 2011, we have provided more than $60 million to nonprofits across our communities and have been recognized as a top philanthropy by the San Francisco Business Journal. We also provide 16 hours of paid time off to employees for volunteering and match charitable donations up to $1,000 annually. As a Delta Dental employee, you’ll help us build a more inclusive workplace, collaborate with our communities and re-imagine what we can do in an ever-changing environment.
[view jobs](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/search/company/deltadentalins>)[view profile](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/profiles/deltadentalins>)
![](https://pilbox.themuse.com/image.jpg?filter=antialias&opt=1&pos=top-left&prog=1&q=keep&url=https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/15000168/about_modules/None/profile_image_1.jpg&w=327)![](https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/15000168/small_logo.png)
### The Hartford
If you’re looking for a role where you can have real impact, look no further. When you join us, you’ll have all the resources you need to reach your full potential and contribute to company success. Our human-centric approach to work and performance values each person and their unique contributions. We’re committed to fostering a sense of belonging. No matter where you’re working, you’ll know you’re an integral part of a supportive and collaborative community at the team level and within the larger enterprise. We believe that to do your best, your well-being needs to come first. We’re always adding to our employee programs, giving our people the resources they need to live healthier, more fulfilling lives. By doing this now, it helps each one of them create a brighter, more secure future for themselves and their families.
[view jobs](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/search/company/thehartford>)[view profile](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/profiles/thehartford>)
## A smarter way to search for jobs
![Company Culture 1](https://pilbox.themuse.com?&url=https://assets.themuse.com/media/lead/homepage_culture_row_1.jpg&w=336&h=336&filter=antialias&opt=1&pos=center&prog=1&q=keep)
### What we offer job seekers
We unlock professional advice for people exploring their options, job searches tailored to personal priorities, company profiles that go behind the scenes at an org, and more.
![Company Culture 2](https://pilbox.themuse.com?&url=https://assets.themuse.com/media/lead/homepage_culture_row_2.jpg&w=336&h=336&filter=antialias&opt=1&pos=center&prog=1&q=keep)
### What we offer employers
We help companies build a more robust, informed candidate pipeline and strengthen their employer brand through authentic storytelling and targeted job postings. You can even earn special recognition for your perks and benefits through our annual [VIBE Awards](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/advice/vibe-awards-2023>).
![Company Culture 3](https://pilbox.themuse.com?&url=https://assets.themuse.com/media/lead/homepage_culture_row_3.jpg&w=336&h=336&filter=antialias&opt=1&pos=center&prog=1&q=keep)
### How we do it better
We combine the speed and scale of technology with a deep understanding of people to clarify your career search and connect you with companies that fit your life and goals.
## Sign up for our newsletter
We'll deliver you emails with career advice to guide every stage of your journey and help you find jobs at inspiring companies that are hiring.
Sign Up
By signing up, you agree to our [Terms of Service](http://themuse.com/</user/terms>) & [Privacy Policy](http://themuse.com/</user/privacy>).
## Discover companies that share your values.

### Featured Companies
![](https://pilbox.themuse.com/image.jpg?filter=antialias&opt=1&pos=top-left&prog=1&q=keep&url=https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/15000303/about_modules/None/profile_image_1.jpg&w=327)![](https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/15000303/small_logo.png)
### CSL
CSL is a leading global biotechnology company with a dynamic portfolio of lifesaving medicines, including those that treat haemophilia and immune deficiencies, vaccines to prevent influenza, and therapies in iron deficiency, dialysis and nephrology. Since our start in 1916, we have been driven by our promise to save lives using the latest technologies. Today, CSL – including our businesses, CSL Behring, CSL Seqirus, CSL Plasma and CSL Vifor – provides lifesaving products to patients in more than 100 countries and employs 32,000 people. Our unique combination of commercial strength, R&D focus and operational excellence enables us to identify, develop and deliver innovations so our patients can live life to the fullest.
[view jobs](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/search/company/csl>)[view profile](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/profiles/csl>)
![](https://pilbox.themuse.com/image.jpg?filter=antialias&opt=1&pos=top-left&prog=1&q=keep&url=https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/11868/about_modules/91931/2daba984-b543-47c1-b1ef-23d9bfdea5d9.jpg&w=327)![](https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/11868/small_logo.png)
### DTCC
DTCC was established five decades ago to reduce risk in the financial markets by centralizing and streamlining the processing of securities transactions. Today, the company stands at the center of global trading activity, processing over 100 million financial transactions every day, and maintaining multiple data and operating centers worldwide. Year Founded: 1973 Website: www.dtcc.com Join our Talent Community! Click here to find your purpose at DTCC!
[view jobs](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/search/company/dtcc>)[view profile](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/profiles/dtcc>)
![](https://pilbox.themuse.com/image.jpg?filter=antialias&opt=1&pos=top-left&prog=1&q=keep&url=https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/15000322/about_modules/119218/2332332b-fe18-4a1f-849e-425ef6c4989f.jpg&w=327)![](https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/15000322/small_logo.png)
### Grainger
We believe the collective sum of our individual differences makes our business stronger, our teams more innovative and makes Grainger a great place to work. That’s why we foster an inclusive environment where all team members can feel safe, valued, and encouraged to voice their opinions as they learn and grow at all stages of their career. We're proud of our people-focused culture that's been active for nearly 100 years. Join us as We Keep The World Working®: jobs.grainger.com.
[view jobs](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/search/company/grainger>)[view profile](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/profiles/grainger>)
![](https://pilbox.themuse.com/image.jpg?filter=antialias&opt=1&pos=top-left&prog=1&q=keep&url=https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/15000150/about_modules/None/profile_image_1.jpg&w=327)![](https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/15000150/small_logo.png)
### Unum Group
We know that when we help our employees live their best lives, they’ll do the same for our customers. This is why we provide so many opportunities for growth and development. It’s why we work in a hybrid setting that combines the best of in-person connection and work-from-home flexibility. And it’s why we embrace diversity in our people and their ideas. Because when we do this, we can all enjoy an award-winning workplace that offers the resources, opportunities and support necessary to helping everyone thrive.
[view jobs](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/search/company/unumgroup>)[view profile](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/profiles/unumgroup>)
![](https://pilbox.themuse.com/image.jpg?filter=antialias&opt=1&pos=top-left&prog=1&q=keep&url=https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/12064/about_modules/120157/171918ca-5819-4996-ac3e-cbd9244fb711.jpg&w=327)![](https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/12064/small_logo.png)
### Fannie Mae
We are motivated and committed to helping renters, homebuyers, and homeowners throughout their home journey. The work we do has the power to make an impact that extends for generations to come. Our team members advance and evolve their individual careers while tackling new opportunities to deliver on this vision and purpose. We achieve our goals by listening to each other’s diverse perspectives and by collaborating and innovating with our industry partners like lenders, services, and housing experts. We have the support of Fannie Mae’s comprehensive benefits, unique rewards, and flexible work options to live our lives with purpose both at work and at home.
[view jobs](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/search/company/fanniemae>)[view profile](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/profiles/fanniemae>)
![](https://pilbox.themuse.com/image.jpg?filter=antialias&opt=1&pos=top-left&prog=1&q=keep&url=https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/11781/about_modules/86378/d2348385-73e8-4731-95f8-4085d986f695.jpg&w=327)![](https://assets.themuse.com/uploaded/companies/11781/small_logo.png)
### iCapital
iCapital’s mission is to power the world’s alternative investment marketplace. Its financial technology platform has transformed the way alternative investments are bought and sold through the development of tech-based solutions for advisors, their high-net-worth client base, asset managers, and banks. The firm’s flagship platform offers advisors and their clients access to a curated menu of private equity and hedge funds at lower minimums with a full suite of due diligence and administrative support in a secure digital environment. Asset managers and banks leverage iCapital’s tech-enabled services to streamline and scale their private investments’ operational infrastructure. Check them out at iCapital.
[view jobs](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/search/company/icapital>)[view profile](http://themuse.com/<https:/www.themuse.com/profiles/icapital>)

generated_description:
### The Muse: A Values-Driven Career Platform

Founded in 2011 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W12, The Muse is a New York-based company helping over seven million monthly users navigate their careers. At its core, The Muse provides a values-based job search and hiring platform tailored to Gen Z and millennials. It connects job seekers with employers whose values, benefits, and workplace culture resonate with the candidates' professional needs.

#### Mission and Offerings
The Muse's mission is simple but powerful: to ensure that job matches are more than just skills and titles; they're about cultural fit and personal fulfillment. For job seekers, it’s about finding roles where they can thrive. For employers, The Muse provides a marketplace that streamlines hiring by presenting a diverse and authentic employer brand, ultimately leading to better retention rates.

Key features of The Muse include:

- **Job Listings**: A rich variety of career options ranging from account management to software engineering.
- **Company Insights**: In-depth profiles of companies that showcase their work culture, values, and environments.
- **Career Advice**: Resources and expert advice aimed at empowering job seekers through every stage of their journey.
- **Coaching Services**: Access to certified coaches who can assist with resume building, job strategies, and personal branding.

#### Team and Growth
With a dedicated team of about 60 employees, The Muse focuses on building a workplace culture that mirrors the values it promotes. This culture emphasizes inclusivity, development, and connection—important factors that reflect its commitment to fostering great workplace environments.

#### Current Landscape
As of now, The Muse operates as a multipurpose platform tagged with terms like ‘marketplace,’ ‘SaaS,’ and ‘recruiting.’ It continues to innovate within the job search landscape by blending technology with a humanistic approach, clarifying the search process for both job seekers and employers.

Through its commitment to values-driven hiring and job searching, The Muse stands as a beacon for those seeking a meaningful career path. By aligning personal and organizational values, it doesn’t just aim to fill positions—it aspires to transform the way work is perceived and experienced. Want to learn more or explore available roles? Check out [The Muse](http://themuse.com) today.
